thread.title: Former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort had plan to benefit Putin government, AP reports
thread.title_full: Former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort had plan to benefit Putin government, AP reports

author: The Associated Press
title: Former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort had plan to benefit Putin government, AP reports
text: President Donald Trump's former campaign chairman, Paul Manafort, secretly worked for a Russian billionaire to advance the interests of Russian President Vladimir Putin a decade ago and proposed an ambitious political strategy to undermine anti-Russian opposition across former Soviet republics, The Associated Press has learned.
